ft.gloss: a linear unit of length equal to 12 inches or a third of a yard

ft-l.gloss: a former luminance unit equal to one lumen per square foot

ftc.gloss: an independent agency of the United States federal government that maintains fair and free competition

fthm.gloss: a linear unit of measurement (equal to 6 feet) for water depth

fto.gloss: a political movement that uses terror as a weapon to achieve its goals

ftp.gloss: protocol that allows users to copy files between their local system and any system they can reach on the network
